scripts.mongo-config: concurrently "sudo mkdir -p Momgo/data/db" "sudo mongod --dbpath Mongo/data/db" "node mongo-config.js"
scripts.config: npm install && npm --prefix ./App install --force && npm --prefix ./Server install && npm run mongo-config && npm --prefix ./App run prod-build
scripts.start: concurrently "mongod --dbpath Mongo/data/db" " npm --prefix ./App run prod" "npm --prefix ./Server start"
